thread.title: Iceland's President Says He Would Gladly Ban Pineapple Pizzas If He Could, Starts An Online Row - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Iceland's President Says He Would Gladly Ban Pineapple Pizzas If He Could, Starts An Online Row - Indiatimes.com

title: Iceland's President Says He Would Gladly Ban Pineapple Pizzas If He Could, Starts An Online Row - Indiatimes.com
text:
Anjali Bisaria February 22, 2017 
One of the world's most hotly debated subject is that of pineapple pizzas. While on one hand we have those who can't stand the sight of the godforsaken fruit (count me as one of them), the other group will promptly sell their souls to defend it. 
visir 
I mean, as a pizza topping, pineapple is a grave mistake. And agreeing with us is Iceland's president, Guðni Th. Jóhannesson. 
While answering questions at a North Iceland high school, one student asked for Jóhannesson's take on pineapple pizzas. And without blinking an eye, the president expressed his scorn for the dish. 
bondi pizza 
He said that if he had the power, he would simply pass a law to ban the loathsome combination across Iceland, reported local media source, Visir . Folks on Twitter immediately jumped to defend and offend pineapple pizzas. Iceland's President is the hero we all need right now... #pineappleonpizza
